0002 %         Regression Test Unit of loadjson and savejson
0003 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
0004 
0005 for i=1:4
0006     fname=sprintf('example%d.json',i);
0007     if(exist(fname,'file')==0) break; end
0008     fprintf(1,'===============================================\n>> %s\n',fname);
0009     json=savejson('data',loadjson(fname));
0010     fprintf(1,'%s\n',json);
0011     fprintf(1,'%s\n',savejson('data',loadjson(fname),'Compact',1));
0012     data=loadjson(json);
0013     savejson('data',data,'selftest.json');
0014     data=loadjson('selftest.json');
0015 end
0016 
0017 for i=1:4
0018     fname=sprintf('example%d.json',i);
0019     if(exist(fname,'file')==0) break; end
0020     fprintf(1,'===============================================\n>> %s\n',fname);
0021     json=saveubjson('data',loadjson(fname));
0022     fprintf(1,'%s\n',json);
0023     data=loadubjson(json);
0024     savejson('',data);
0025     saveubjson('data',data,'selftest.ubj');
0026     data=loadubjson('selftest.ubj');
0027 end
